title: Spur Gear Blank
summary: Approximate involute spur gear using mirrored tooth profiles built from rectangles and arcs.

parameters.tooth_count: Number of teeth along the pitch circle.
parameters.module_size: Metric module; controls tooth size and pitch diameter.
parameters.thickness: Gear thickness along the Z axis.
parameters.bore_diameter: Diameter of the center shaft hole.
parameters.hole_count: Number of weight reduction holes placed around the hub.
parameters.hole_diameter: Diameter of each weight reduction hole.

notes: Provides a practical polygon-based tooth approximation without external libraries.
